name: openai-opa-generator-agent
description: MCP-based Agent for generating OPA Rego policies using OpenAI with tool orchestration

scripts.setup-mcp-servers: cd mcp-servers && for dir in */; do cd "$dir" && npm install && cd ..; done
scripts.deploy: zip -r function-agent.zip . -x 'node_modules/.cache/*' '*.git*' 'test/*' && aws lambda update-function-code --function-name $LAMBDA_FUNCTION_NAME --zip-file fileb://function-agent.zip

author: OpenAI OPA Agent

docs-retriever.description: Gather docs, examples, and best practices

code-generator.description: Generate new Rego rules from requirements

code-refiner.description: Refine, optimize, and explain Rego code

unit-tester.description: Validate rule correctness with test cases

deployment-helper.description: Assist with OPA integration and deployment
